ygData.messageBody:
Hmm maybe I read the thread wrong but it seemed like Absor was going to
seriously look into it? Dunno, maybe I'm an optimist. Not to say we
shouldn't raise a stink if in fact it happens cuz that would just plain
suck, specially for lev and invis ...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 1:26 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!
>
>
> So it's okay to go AFK for 30 minutes to meditate or
> chloroplast heal but
> not to Hymn? So are all caster buffs going to end when the
> caster logs off
> so they can't park an enchanter nearby just to clarity and
> log him on and
> off? Plain and simple this is stupid. It's another example of where
> probably some bard was sitting AFK on the planes and now we
> all have to be
> nerfed because someone abused the situation. Heaven forbid
> they should
> handle this by putting in an auto logoff when someone is
> inactive for more
> than 10 minutes like most games do.
>
> Kit
